definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: sound, efficient wisdom, abiding success (on der., v. supr.; acc. to Fl De prop. advancement, or mental aptitude that advances: for the form, cf. [[חוּגׇה]] and [[תַּאֲנִיׇה]]; Sta:§ 262), a technical term of theWisdLT;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sound, efficient wisdom Is 28:29 (of ´[[י]]) [[הפליא]] [[עחח חגדיל חושׁיה]]; Pr 3:21 [[וּמְזִמָּה]] ´[[נְחׂר תּ]]; Pr 8:14 (Wisdom speaks) ´[[לִי עֵחָח וח]]; Pr 18:1 [[יִחֽגַּלָָּע]] ´[[לכל תּ]]; Job 11:6 (of ´[[י]]: v.Di), Job 12:6 ´[[עִמּוֹ עׂז ות]]; Job 26:3 [[לָרׂב]] ´[[ות]] [[הוֹרָ֑עֽתָּ]] (‖[[תׇעַעְחָ לְלאׂ חָכְמָה]]

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of the effect of sound wisdom, abiding success (for the combination of meanings, cf. [[הִשְׂכִּיל]] to shew wisdom. and also to achieve success). Job 5:12 [[ולא חעשׂינה]] ´[[ידיהם ח]] do not achieve abiding success; Job 6:13 and abiding success (‖[[עַזְרָחִי]]) is driven from me; Pr 2:7 ´[[יִעְפּׂן לַיִשָׁרִים ת]]; Mic 6:9 [[וחושׁיה יראה שׁׂמך]], i.e (si vera l.) he that seeth (heedeth) thy name is well-advised (Ges:§ 155, 2 b3; Dav:§ 29 e).—[[חֻשִׁיָה]] Job 30:22, v. sub. [[שׁוא]].
